attributes.action: Introduce regulation to control the use of Personal Water Craft (aka Jet Skis)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The use of Personal Water Craft, (aka  Jet Skis) is becoming widespread and there is very little control on their use. 

We call on the Prime Minister to introduce regulation to include:

The compulsory registration, licensing and insurance of all Personal Water Craft (DVLA could handle this). All Personal Water Craft to display a clearly legible registration number.

The introduction of a national equivalent of the Highway Code for users of these craft with associated penalties.

Use of these machines only allowed in an area by permit following a public consultation and an assessment of the environmental impact. All other areas are out of bounds by definition.

Waterside areas and launching areas to by clearly signposted if there is permission to use Jet Skis. If there is no sign, there is no permission. Signs to include a map of the permitted usage area and a phone number to report abuse.
